parameters.name: ShardLevelMetrics
parameters.description: List of shard-level metrics to disable. The following are the valid shard-level metrics. The value ' ALL' disables every metric. IncomingBytes IncomingRecords OutgoingBytes OutgoingRecords WriteProvisionedThroughputExceeded ReadProvisionedThroughputExceeded IteratorAgeMilliseconds ALL For more information, see Monitoring the Amazon Kinesis Data Streams Service with Amazon CloudWatch in the Amazon Kinesis Data Streams Developer Guide. (string) ---

nested_items.name: StreamName
nested_items.description: The name of the Kinesis data stream.

nested_items.name: CurrentShardLevelMetrics
nested_items.description: Represents the current state of the metrics that are in the enhanced state before the operation.

nested_items.name: DesiredShardLevelMetrics
nested_items.description: Represents the list of all the metrics that would be in the enhanced state after the operation.
